About Devine Globe

[vc_column_text css=”.vc_custom_1675074923582{padding-right: 10% !important;padding-left: 10% !important;}” el_class=”devine-globe-content”]

At Devine Globe, our development team keeps things up-to-date with the latest tech to bring you top-notch web, software, and mobile app solutions. We’ve been helping businesses around the world since 2018 with a 100% success rate on delivering projects. Let us bring our creativity and expertise to your next project!

Read More

[/vc_column_text][vc_empty_space height=”80px”][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row css_animation=”fadeInUp” row_content_width=”grid” enable_grid_lines=”” css=”.vc_custom_1594487341125{padding-top: 70px !important;padding-bottom: 65px !important;}” simple_background_color=”rgba(229,99,0,0.04)”][vc_column]

What We Do

[/vc_column][vc_column css_animation=”fadeInUp” offset=”vc_col-lg-4 vc_col-md-12 vc_col-xs-12″]
Mobile App Development

We develop an app for your mobile device to ease your task with customer interaction. They are developed for basic purposes including education, business, art and craft and different geometric and scientific tools.

Read More
[vc_empty_space height=”47px”]
Blockchain App Development

Record the transaction of data with our unique and secure approach from our app via a suitable network.

Read More
[vc_empty_space height=”47px”][/vc_column][vc_column css_animation=”fadeInUp” offset=”vc_col-lg-4 vc_col-md-12 vc_col-xs-12″]
Android App Development

Android offers a variety of ways to present content to a user. Increase your business with the majority of android users.

Read More
[vc_empty_space height=”47px”]
Artificial Intelligence

Automate the whole system using human intelligence techniques.

Read More
[vc_empty_space height=”47px”][/vc_column][vc_column css_animation=”fadeInUp” offset=”vc_col-lg-4 vc_col-md-12 vc_col-xs-12″]
iOS App Development

Increase your revenue from the iOS app.Learn the best practices for enhancing the functionality and performance of your web content on iOS.

Read More
[vc_empty_space height=”47px” css=”.vc_custom_1617518021872{margin-bottom: 30px !important;}”]
The Internet of Things

Control your Electronic Device to improve your time with us

Read More

Awesome Portfolio

[/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row css_animation=”fadeInUp” disable_element=”yes” row_content_width=”grid” enable_grid_lines=”” css=”.vc_custom_1654929717539{padding-bottom: 130px !important;}”][vc_column]

Sorry, no posts matched your criteria.

[vc_empty_space][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row css_animation=”fadeInUp” enable_grid_lines=”” css=”.vc_custom_1594487425292{padding-bottom: 130px !important;background-color: rgba(229,99,0,0.04) !important;*background-color: rgb(229,99,0) !important;}” el_class=”faqs-process-section”][vc_column]

Process We Explore

[/vc_column][vc_column css_animation=”fadeInUp” width=”1/2″ el_class=”faqs-left-section” css=”.vc_custom_1594309102965{padding-right: 10% !important;padding-left: 10% !important;}”]
Requirement Analysis
[vc_column_text css_animation=”fadeInUp”]We appreciate your idea in terms of your requirements and focus on the concept with necessary views. If the attributes coincide with practical aspects technically and in marketing-wise then we follow or still if the update relies on the app to progress then the conversation will be ahead for our finer services to improve your concept.[/vc_column_text]
Agreement with Relevant Needs
[vc_column_text css_animation=”fadeInUp”]Based on the proposal and conversation for your app development, agreement with suitable terms will be designed and we’ll start to proceed with the next step.[/vc_column_text]
Prototypes
[vc_column_text css_animation=”fadeInUp”]Offer various selective prototypes that help to increase the app’s function speed with highly interactive mode.[/vc_column_text]
Technical Feasibility
[vc_column_text css_animation=”fadeInUp”]This process will allow you to know that your need in terms of technology is suitable or not. For example, to develop an android app, many technologies are available such as react native, flutter, etc. Choosing such technology must suit your app needs too. Hence to verify such a process is called technical feasibility checking.[/vc_column_text]
Wireframe
[vc_column_text css_animation=”fadeInUp”]To improve and develop a logical flow for your entire app, designing a wireframe is important. It allows for developing an interactive layout for your app.[/vc_column_text]
Design
[vc_column_text css_animation=”fadeInUp”]According to the requirement analysis, the app development process will be focused and trained to ensure an interactive and approachable solution for the respective visitors/customers from the app of our clients.[/vc_column_text]
[/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/2″ el_class=”globle-all-process”][vc_empty_space height=”50px”][vc_single_image image=”5394″ img_size=”full” alignment=”right” css_animation=”fadeInUp”][/vc_column][vc_column css_animation=”fadeInUp” el_class=”align-center”] View More [/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row content_placement=”middle” row_content_width=”grid” enable_grid_lines=”” css=”.vc_custom_1591632849024{padding-top: 130px !important;padding-bottom: 130px !important;background-color: #ffffff !important;}”][vc_column offset=”vc_col-lg-6 vc_col-md-12″]
